Emby server.description:
Emby media server.

Note: uses `net=host` to enable core functionality.

Based on the official OCI image, available for amd64 architecture only.
Emby server.more_info:
Adding media to Emby.

You can add Shares(with media) to Emby from the settings wizard of this Rock-on. Then, from Emby WebUI, you can update and re-index your library.

Visit https://hub.docker.com/r/emby/embyserver for description of each option.

/config.description: Share for the Emby Server configuration.
/config.label: Config Storage [e.g. emby-config]

/media.description: Share with media content. It will be available as /media inside Emby.
/media.label: Media Storage [e.g. emby-media]

GID.description: GID of an existing user with permission to media shares to run Emby as.
GID.label: GID

GIDLIST.description: Enter a comma-separated list of additional GIDs to run emby as
GIDLIST.label: GIDList

UID.description: UID of an existing user with permission to media shares to run Emby as.
UID.label: UID

VAAPI.description: <u>Optional:</u> path to hardware transcoding device (/dev/dri/renderD128). Leave blank if not needed.
VAAPI.label: VAAPI device
